DOC.brief_summary: This pilot randomize trial intend evaluate effectiveness acupuncture , chiropractic massage chronic back pain older young adult .
DOC.brief_title: Physical CAM Therapies Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Low back pain duration least 3 month ; Low back pain occur past week ; No numbness tingle low extremity ; No pain radiate knee ; No use massage , chiropractic acupuncture reason past year ; Able attend schedule appointment ; Able hear , read , understand English ; No low back pain surgery past 3 year ; No unexplained weight loss ; No previous vertebral spinal fracture ; No previous nontraumatic bone fracture ; No spinal pathology , include scoliosis , spinal stenosis , osteoporosis , ankylose spondylitis ; No cancer ( except simple skin cancer ) past 5 year ; No pacemaker ; No bleeding problem anticoagulant use ; No major organ transplant ; No oral corticosteroid use 4 consecutive week past year ; Can pregnant ; Must able get floor ; Able walk 2 flat city block unassisted ; Willing participate periodic telephone interview .
